title: Entertainment Live: Blackadder to return? - BBC News
summary: the wanted 's jay mcguiness joins strictly line-up .
forest whitaker to make broadway stage debut .
one direction to 'take a break ' next year .
taylor swift shows off celeb mates .

documents.title: that 's all folks !
text: and that 's that for today 's live page .
be sure to join us again tomorrow from 08:30 bst for more entertainment and arts news .
in case you missed it , we 'll leave you with this great clip of british actor david oyelowo and his dad on the tonight show with jimmy fallon .
take a bow , sir .
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: v festival highlights
text: this weekend saw a host of music artists play the v festival in chelmsford and shropshire .
new voice judge paloma faith was one of the headliners .
george ezra played the main stage .
followed by ellie goulding who banged her drums .
calvin harris brought the dance tunes , bringing each night to an end .
festival favourites the proclaimers were also to hand .
olly murs headlined the mtv stage .
after sam smith 's set , the singer tweeted : `` that weekend was unreal ! !
i am now off on holiday . ''

documents.title: wanted star joins strictly
text: following on from dancing with the stars , the latest name has been announced for this series of strictly come dancing and it 's jay mcguiness from boy band the wanted .
the news was announced on radio 1 .
mcguiness insisted he is a dancing novice : `` i 've never rumba 'd - we 've done a few things today and worn some clothes , but no official dance training yet .
`` in the group we were about as coordinated as a sack of frogs , so they gave up and made us stand in different positions and walk around a bit . ''
he joins names such as celebrity cook ainsley harriott , weather presenter carol kirkwood and singer daniel o'donnell .

documents.title: first dancing with the stars contestant named
text: taking a leaf out of the pages of strictly come dancing 's publicity strategy , the makers of dancing with the stars in the us have announced the first celeb to take part in the upcoming series .
bindi irwin , the teenage daughter of the late crocodile hunter star steve irwin , was announced on good morning america earlier .

irwin , who is now an actress and tv presenter said : `` i just hope my dance partner , whoever it is , is very patient and likes animals , because you never know what i 'm going to bring to rehearsal . ''
expect more names to come

documents.title: hugh jackman in concert
text: hugh jackman is planning a concert tour in australia beginning in november .
broadway to oz will mix songs with storytelling , following the journey of the star 's life , from his early days in australia , to successes in musical theatre and hollywood stardom .
the wolverine actor will be backed by a company of 150 musicians and dancers .
speaking to reporters in sydney , the star said :
anybody who knows me knows that keeping secrets is not my forte today is the announcement of a true bucket list moment for me .
you will get to know the real me .
the eight-date concert tour opens in melbourne on 24 november , with later stops in sydney , perth , adelaide and brisbane .
jackman tweeted the poster for his show earlier this morning .
live on concert .

documents.title: ed 's home and away character revealed
text: after revealing earlier this year that he was to have a cameo role in aussie soap home and away , ed sheeran 's scenes are about to be screened in australia .
the singer will appear as 'teddy ' - one of the children marilyn was nanny to when she lived in the uk .
the character visits the fictional summer bay and surprises everyone when 'teddy ' turns out to be the chart-topping singer 's childhood nickname .
he then treats them all to a special performance .
alec snow , who plays matt page in the soap , said : `` it was an awesome experience filming with ed because he seemed like a really down-to-earth , nice guy that genuinely wanted to be there .
`` it was funny seeing how star-struck everyone both on and off set was .
it was quite entertaining seeing the effect he had on everyone around him . ''
uk soap bosses take note - ed will happily appear on your show too .
he said : `` i got asked to do it and it sounded like it could be fun .
i 'm sure if emmerdale or eastenders ever ask me in england i would do that as well . ''
perhaps a role as ian beale 's secret love child beckons ?

documents.title: connolly art exhibition
text: he 's more known for his stand-up comedy , his acing and his travel shows - even perhaps his stint as a banjo player/folk singer in the humblebums - but now billy connolly is to exhibit his artwork .
more than 40 of his drawings will go on display at the people 's palace in glasgow .
connolly told the daily record : `` i do n't want them to be judged .
i did n't want to put them in a position where people would like or dislike them .
`` they 're little pals of mine .
i 'll always draw , i 'll always do it . ''
author: Daily Record

documents.title: tarantino criticises craven
text: quentin tarantino has criticised film director wes craven 's scream movies .
the horror franchise starred neve campbell as a girl stalked by masked killers and even spawned a comedy copycat franchise , scary movie .
in a wide ranging interview on with vulture , tarantino was asked about whether there were any franchises he could have directed .
he answered : `` i could have imagined doing the first scream .
the weinsteins were trying to get robert rodriguez to do it .
i do n't even think they thought i would be interested .
`` i actually did n't care for wes craven 's direction of it .
i thought he was the iron chain attached to its ankle that kept it earthbound and stopped it from going to the moon . ''
ouch .
author: Vulture

documents.title: feeling the pinch
text: two giant fingers measuring a combined 25-tonnes and 14.5 metres have been unveiled in london 's trafalgar square .
the giant digits make up an installation called you , by mexican artist rivelino ( above ) .
the index fingers - which are equal in weight , colour and size - point towards each other as a reflection on human equality .

documents.title: texas university buys ishiguro archive
text: the university of texas has bought the archives of booker prize-winning author kazuo ishiguro for more than $ 1m ( £ 636,000 ) .
the collection included a discarded opening chapter of the remains of the day , along with other unpublished works , notes and screenplays .

`` for many years , i 've been in the habit of keeping a large cardboard box under my desk into which i throw , more or less indiscriminately , all papers produced during my writing that i do n't want to file neatly and take into the next stage of composition , '' ishiguro said .
there is also a manuscript for a pulp western - the author 's first serious attempt at fiction that he thought had been lost , but was found while preparing the collection .
it even includes a song called shingles - written by a young ishiguro who had tried to land a contract with a major record label .
the documents will be held at the harry ransom center research library .

documents.title: spherical floating art
text: a new art installation in los angeles features thousands of hand-painted vinyl balls floating in the macarthur park lake .
the work , titled the spheres at macarthur park , involves filling the park 's 8.39-acre lake with 3,000 balls decorated with floral and fish patterns .
the balls were hand-painted by students from schools across los angeles .
it should be completed in time for 22 august when it will officially be unveiled .

documents.title: blackadder to return ?
text: sir tony robinson has suggested a new series of 1980s comedy blackadder could be in the works .
the star , who played blackadder 's simpleton sidekick baldrick , said the rest of the cast were in favour of reviving the show , but joked there was one stumbling block .
i do think a new series of blackadder is on the cards .
i have spoken to virtually all the cast about this now .
the only problem is hugh 's fee .
he 's a huge star now
with a rumoured salary of £ 250,000 an episode while he was filming hit us drama house , laurie would likely have to take a significant pay cut to take part .
but even if the gang do get back together , sir tony admitted it would be a big risk .
expectations for a new series will be high because people not only remember the original , they remember who they were when it was on .
it 's a big danger .
but fans of the show should n't get too excited , a bbc spokesman said : `` there are no plans to make a new blackadder series . ''
read more on this story .
author: The Sun

documents.title: taylor 's celebrity friends
text: taylor swift is continuing to wheel out the celebs on the la leg of her current 1989 tour .

this weekend she was joined by friends and episodes star matt leblanc , comic chris rock and model sean o'pry , who appeared in her blank space music video , who danced down the stage to her hit style .
if that was n't enough , mary j blige made a special appearance to sing her hits doubt and family affair .
and then orange is the new black star uzo aduba joined swift on stage to perform the song white horse .
this morning , swift also told fans the video for her next single , wildest dreams , would premiere at the mtv video music awards next week , and shared a teaser clip .

documents.title: oscar-winner to make stage debut
text: forest whitaker , who won a bafta , a golden globe and an oscar for portraying dictator idi amin in the last king of scotland , is to make his theatre debut on broadway .
he 's starring in british director michael grandage 's revival of the play hughie .
whitaker will take up the role of a drunken , small time hustler mourning the recent death of his friend - a hotel night clerk - next spring .
the play was first performed on broadway in 1964 with jason robards in the central role .
it has since been played by rocky actor burgess meredith and al pacino .

documents.title: unseen attenborough images revealed
text: a selection of never-before-seen images from the archives of lord richard attenborough have been released on the first anniversary of this death .
one shot shows the actor as a child in a play with his brother , the celebrated broadcaster sir david attenborough .
the exhibition , celebrating his life and work , has been put on by the university of sussex to mark the newly refurbished attenborough centre for the creative arts .
lord attenborough was the university 's chancellor from 1998 until 2008 .
images including film stills from his appearances in movies such as jurassic park and brighton rock have been projected on to the side of the new building .

documents.title: nwa still on top
text: the nwa music biopic straight outta compton has remained top of the us box office for a second week .
the film , which is released in the uk on friday , has earned $ 111.5m ( £ 70.9m ) in the us .
this week 's box office figures come on the back of former member dr dre apologising for his past violent treatment of women , something which the film has been accused of glossing over .
`` i 'm doing everything i can so i never resemble that man again , ''
mission : impossible - rogue nation finished second , with horror sequel sinister 2 in third .

documents.title: mel gibson 'pushed ' photographer
text: actor mel gibson has been accused of pushing a female photographer in sydney .
kristi miller told australian media she was also verbally abused while taking of the braveheart director and his girlfriend .
`` i thought he was going to punch me in the face , '' ms miller said .
`` he was spitting in my face as he was yelling . ''
gibson has not commented on her claims .

documents.title: one direction 'on a break '
text: if newspaper reports are to be believed , one direction are going to take a break for a year in 2016 .
the sun says the group will not tour their fifth album and will concentrate on solo projects instead .
one direction have refused to confirm the reports but unsurprisingly , fans are pretty upset .
read more on this story .

documents.title: get involved
text: how do you feel about the one direction split ?
crying like a baby or could n't give a monkey ?
as ever , send us your thoughts on today 's stories .
tweet
author: Kev Geoghegan
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: happy mondays
text: good morning !
we 're waking up to the sound of millions of hearts breaking this morning as reports suggest one direction are to `` take a break '' next year .
we 'll bring you all the reaction to the news and the rest of today 's updates so stick with us .
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter
